Table of Contents

Class SampleVirtual

Namespace
osu.Framework.Audio.Sample
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A Sample which explicitly plays no audio. Aimed for scenarios in which a non-null Sample is needed, but one that doesn't necessarily play any sound.

public sealed class SampleVirtual : Sample, IDisposable, IUpdateable, ISample, IAdjustableAudioComponent, IAggregateAudioAdjustment
